children.description: In most cases will simply be a string containing a title for the label.

classes.description:
Override or extend the styles applied to the component.
See [CSS API](#css) below for more details.

disabled.description:
Mark the step as disabled, will also disable the button if
`StepLabelButton` is a child of `StepLabel`. Is passed to child components.

icon.description: Override the default label of the step icon.

StepIconComponent.description: The component to render in place of the [`StepIcon`](/api/step-icon/).

descriptions.root: Styles applied to the root element.
descriptions.horizontal: Styles applied to the root element if `orientation="horizontal".
descriptions.vertical: Styles applied to the root element if `orientation="vertical".
descriptions.label: Styles applied to the `Typography` component which wraps `children`.
descriptions.active: Pseudo-class applied to the `Typography` component if `active={true}`.
descriptions.completed: Pseudo-class applied to the `Typography` component if `completed={true}`.
descriptions.error: Pseudo-class applied to the root element and `Typography` component if `error={true}`.
descriptions.disabled: Pseudo-class applied to the root element and `Typography` component if `disabled={true}`.
descriptions.iconContainer: Styles applied to the `icon` container element.
descriptions.alternativeLabel: Pseudo-class applied to the root and icon container and `Typography` if `alternativeLabel={true}`.
descriptions.labelContainer: Styles applied to the container element which wraps `Typography` and `optional`.
